overview: Hawlie is a television host and lifestyle blogger. She is a former news reporter and anchor for NBC affiliates in Williston, ND and Phoenix, AZ. She moved to Los Angeles in 2009. In an effort to build a brand for her television hosting career, she started the “Fab Housewife” blog. This is a blog targeted at the modern housewife; giving tips, advice, and inspiration. She has since turned it into a revenue generating business.
